metadata.synopsis: An NPC notices a weird rolling cheese wheel, bowling along the streets all by itself. It is in fact the player, who has been transformed into a cheese by a disgruntled djinni.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_AEnter Circusoe WYR_Circus_TestCheeseroll around NPCs : Civilians, Guards (but not constructs) and Rats will play this reaction.

1.text: HELP! IT'S POSSESSED! THE CHEESE IS POSSESSED!
